member.name: T:Syn.EmotionML.ActionTendency

member.summary: Gets Frijda's action tendencies vocabulary URI

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the action tendency.
The static scale value which must be a floating point value from the closed interval [0, 1].

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the action tendency.
The static scale value which must be a floating point value from the closed interval [0, 1].
The annotator's confidence that the annotation given for this action tendency is correct.
